snippet: From subways to sky-high offices, people scurry to and fro in Manhattan, creating something like a giant ant mound — precisely what you will find if you zoom in on its sparse patches of soil.
abstract: Study published in journal Insect Conservation and Diversity shows that at least 42 species of ants can be found in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: From subways to sky-high offices, people scurry to and fro in Manhattan, creating something like a giant ant mound — precisely what you will find if you zoom in on its sparse patches of soil.
